name: 妄想大碰撞 Fantasy Clash
description:
《Fantasy clash》where you are a chef, a programmer, and an elite from all walks of life, experiencing a professional life in the story mode, battling wits and bravery in the challenge mode, and experiencing a hundred variations of skill-matching combinations in the tournament mode. Fighting with the flexible AI in a different style of fighting!

Feature:


Dream train
Selecting characters in the dream train and reaching various places to challenge every event or combat.Your combat skill will be more than a hundred types.Defend of attack?
Growing in strategy!



COMBO system
Each skill has its own effect and use,and the COMBO system will make them refreshed and more strategic.



Tournament mode
After skilled on the story mode, the tournament mode will be unlocked.You can build your own combat strategy freely here.The random rogue event and the opponent in this mode will make every game randomized.And you can make your own choice to build and respond to them.Have more fun and enjoy the whole experience!


Plan:
As an Independent Game which is made by few people.We would like to offer different fun for all of the players with this unique RTS game.
In this first relase,we will open 1 character(Chef),and the second character(Programmer) will come up in the free update which is coming soon.And more characters are coming!
